title: BlindTest - Guess the Cartoons
description:
You think you can remember all the intros to your favourite childhood cartoons? Prove it in this BlindTest application which features all the famous cartoon intros from the 80s, 90s and 2000s.
With nearly 100 cartoons in the game, immerse yourself in your childhood, bring back some memories of all the cartoons you watched and liked !
 
HOW THE APPLICATION WORKS
It's very simple, for every intro you have an extract that lasts between 3 and 15 secs from which you need to recognize the cartoon associated.
Once you have found the answer, you can watch and listen to the entire intro cartoon within the application!
You can play alone or with friends for great moments of fun and nostalgic memories.
 
If you were ever a fan of Inspector Gadget, Scooby Doo or PokÃƒÂ©mon, you can now rediscover all cartoons of your childhood:

Many updates are planned to add new cartoons in future. You can contact us ator directly from the application with the "Feedback" button to submit new animated series, or to report any videos that donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t work. Thank you in advance!
 
AN OVERVIEW OF THE CARTOONS
An idea of cartoons into the application Blind Test - Guess the Cartoons :

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ And many more! (Nearly 100!)
 
Blind Test - Guess the Cartoons is like "Logo Quiz", but with intros of famous cartoons and there are audio clips and videos embedded directly in the application. This game will back memories from your childhood, for young and old.
If you are parents, you can also play with your child, both of you will find answers in this family-friendly game.
